commitResults.messageTitle: Add skeletal version of Duke
Add list to store text entered by user
Revert "Add list to store text entered by user"
Add list to store text entered by user
Add option to mark tasks and Task class
commitResults.messageBody:
Tasks can be marked as done or undone. Wordings are modified.

Task class is added to store name, number and task information.

commitResults.messageTitle: Add task types: Todo, Deadline and Event
commitResults.messageBody:
Subclasses of Tasks are created, namely Todo, Deadline and Event.
Deadline and Event are able to store information on the task's time.
Some wording are also modified.

commitResults.messageTitle: Add exceptions to task commands
commitResults.messageBody:
Exceptions are missing index, invalid index, invalid command and
incomplete command caused by missing task or task time.

commitResults.messageTitle: Add function to delete a task
Fix time to be read as date time instead of string
commitResults.messageBody: Time format is shown as "MMM dd yyyy HHmm a".

commitResults.messageTitle: Add save task list to hard disk function
commitResults.messageBody: Existing ask list is able to be reflected in duke when restarted.

commitResults.messageTitle: Remove print lines for debugging
Edit data time format of task saved to hard disk
Add command to find deadlines or events on date
Move exception methods from Duke to DukeException
Refactor the code to extract out closely related code as classes
commitResults.messageBody:
Ui: deals with interactions with the user
Storage: deals with loading tasks from the file and saving tasks in the
file
Parser: deals with making sense of the user command
TaskList: contains the task list e.g. it has operations to add/delete
tasks in the list

commitResults.messageTitle: Divide classes into packages
Add JUnit tests for Todo and TaskList
Add JavaDoc comments
Tweak the code to comply with a coding standard
Add function for users to find a task by searching for a keyword
Update JavaDoc comments for duke.main package
Update JavaDoc comments for duke.task package
Update JavaDoc comments for duke.exception package
